column5: Was down by the lake to see if the ice was out (not yet) but lots of ducks where there was open water and this guy cruisin' along the edge of the ice...
That picture defines "crusin for a brusin" lol
haha what lake is this? i was out in the boat today .. It was such a nice day !
He's just itching to catch an open water fish.
Thats the local Ice breaker Norm.  Wont be long now.
I've already had my boat in the water three times in the past week... and walked the Toronto Islands the week before that... you think I want to catch an open water fish or something????

is it just me or is there something wrong with that picture?  first theres ice still out there second - hes in a boat motoring right beside the ice third - he is not wearing a life jacket, with the water temps  one would think he might want to atleast have a slim chance if he hits the ice and rolls the boat over.  just my opinion of course...
Hey Skeeter...you're right you know...he was lucky the ice was there and the OPP wern't...no ice left today...
